entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border in the afternoon. Snow level 1800 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
